top_comments.comment: I really love how you transcend your emotions in your songs. You're a true artist Nadine. Keep doing you.

I'm already on a red eye flight
Left a note outside your door
Couldn't bear to look into your eyes
See your heart sink right in to the floor

I've gone back and forth a hundred times
Played it over in my head
But there's no easy way to say goodbye
When I'm still tastin' you on my lips

Need a little time to think
You don't gotta wait for me
You can do your own thing
While I do some work on me
I don't wanna make a mess of your love
And I can't be the one that's holding you up
You can do your own thing
You don't gotta wait for me

You can't drink away a memory
And a touch won't wash away
What's meant to be will always be
Leave a crack in the door just in case

Before it all goes up in smoke
Love me hard and let me go
Good things can fall apart
I don't mean mean to break break your heart

Need a little time to think
You don't gotta wait for me
You can do your own thing
While I do some work on me
I don't wanna make a mess of your love
And I can't be the one that's holding you up
You can do your own thing
You don't gotta wait

You don't gotta wait for me, me, me
Wait for me, me
You don't gotta wait
You don't gotta wait for me

I'm already on a red eye flight
Left a note outside your door
Couldn't bear to look into your eyes
No...

Need a little time to think
You don't gotta wait for me
You can do your own thing
While I do some work on me
I don't wanna make a mess of your love
And I can't be the one that's holding you up
You can do your own thing
You don't gotta wait for me

comments_since_last_sample.body: HAHAHA KALA KO SYA KUMANTA NG WAIT FOR ME SA TIKTOK
I really love how you transcend your emotions in your songs. You're a true artist Nadine. Keep doing you.

Music with purpose.  The absolute feels on this is insane.
In this day and age of social/digital media. Everyone has built a sense of entitlement to knowing every piece of information. The beauty of Nadines heartbreak, is that its her experience and hers alone, ultimately, we all hurt and we all feel pain, but we experience it entirely different. 

As a 90s baby, this was nostalgic. I appreciate this song so much!
Gives me chills from start to end. The feels. 💕
i can't stop listening to this song its too good
Ikaw padin ung queen namin mamiiii 👸😘💝💝
